appearance.breed: 純黑短毛貓，Bombay 貓風格
appearance.body: 修長優雅，肌肉線條流暢，動作輕盈無聲
appearance.face: 楔形臉，輪廓分明，大而圓的金琥珀色眼睛，在暗處會微微發光

胸前有一小撮白毛，像領結一樣
尾巴末端有一圈深灰色環紋
眼睛是非常亮的金琥珀色，像兩顆琥珀寶石
長而直的白色鬍鬚，在黑毛上特別顯眼
走路時完全無聲，像影子一樣

quirks: 喜歡待在高處俯瞰一切
會挑書本的封面趴著睡

visual_prompt_snippet: [IDENTITY CARD] Momo — a sleek, slender solid-black #0A0A0A Bombay-style shorthair with satin-sheen fur revealing warm brown undertones in direct light. Athletic proportions with visible muscle definition and a slight upward curl at the tail tip. LEFT ear (viewer perspective): single small gold hoop earring #FFD700 (3mm) positioned at the mid-ear edge — the only earring. Ventral chest: tiny natural white locket tuft #FFFFFF (fur only, NOT a collar). Tail tip: single dark-grey #696969 ring. Eyes: large luminous golden-amber #D4A017 like polished amber gems. Long prominent white whiskers. Expression: calm and attentive. [HARD CONSTRAINTS] 1) Solid black fur ONLY — no other body patches or stripes. 2) LEFT ear gold hoop ONLY; NEVER on right ear. 3) White chest locket tuft is the sole white marking. 4) Golden-amber #D4A017 eyes ONLY — NEVER blue or green. 5) Shorthair satin-sheen texture, NEVER long or fluffy. 6) No collar, bandana, or necklace. End.

story_context: 墨墨得名於牠如墨般純粹的黑色。牠是舊書店的常客，喜歡窩在書堆和古物之間，彷彿自己也是一件有年份的藝術品。書店老闆說墨墨有時候會盯著某本書看很久，像在讀書一樣。

seasonal_variants.spring: 在雨天的窗台上看著窗外的櫻花雨
seasonal_variants.summer: 在老宅的竹蓆上優雅地納涼
seasonal_variants.autumn: 在書店裡被一圈楓葉色的書包圍
seasonal_variants.winter: 窩在壁爐前的天鵝絨靠墊上，火光映在金色眼睛裡
